entry.title: 5” Bubbler with Bowl – Clear
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant Distribution
Type: Water Pipe
Price: 9.99

Handcrafted from the highest quality thick borosilicate glass, our 5” Bubbler with Bowl is the perfect handheld piece to deliver smooth, potent hits in a small and discrete package.

  • Hand-Blown Borosilicate Glass
  • Angled Straight Neck
  • Flat Base for Added Stability
  • Removable Glass Bowl

This compact and discrete dry herb bubbler has straightforward, functional design that is elegant in its simplicity. It featured a flat base for added stability and an angled straight neck with removable bowl for ease of use. Thick, high-quality glass and removable bowl makes this bubbler a breeze to clean and maintain. With proper care, it will last for years to come.

If you’re looking for a handheld glass piece that can still provide the look and feel of a bigger bong, then the 5” Bubbler with Bowl will make a perfect addition to your collection!

entry.title: Famous X 8 Inch Beaker Water Pipe with Bowl & Downstem
entry.summary:
Vendor: Famous X
Type: Water Pipe
Price: 19.99

Handcrafted from the highest quality thick borosilicate glass, our 8" water pipes come with a bowl and feature a slitted downstem for smooth diffusion and easily removable cleaning.

  • High-quality borosilicate glass
  • Straight neck with beaker base
  • 18.8mm ground joint
  • Inside-cut 18.8mm > 14.5mm slitted diffuser
  • Clear 14.5mm herb bowl with handle
  • Ideal downstem length: 13.5 cm / 4.3 inches
  • Ice notches
  • No carb hole
  • Black accents on the mouthpiece and bowl

 

The Famous Beaker is handcrafted from the finest borosilicate glass that can withstand the test of time, all delivered, safely stored, in their own matching custom box.

This basic, yet elegant beaker base ice bong is extremely easy to clean and maintain. It features a removable slitted inside-cut 18.8mm > 14.5mm downstem and ice notches, for optimal filtration with a frosty touch.

The beaker comes delivered with a male 14.5mm herb bowl with a handle. The handle not only makes it easy to lift the bowl, without the risk of burning your fingers, but it doubles as a roll stopper as well.

So, if you are on the lookout for a solid beaker ice bong with a special touch to add to your glass collection, you have found your perfect match.

Diffuser Type

Slit

Joint Size

18.8 mm > 14.5 mm

Glass Thickness

4.0 mm

Height

20.3 cm / 8 inches

Material

Glass

Color

clear

Base

Beaker

entry.title: 4 in. Mini Water Pipe
entry.summary:
Vendor: Valiant Distribution Canada
Type: Water Pipe
Price: 19.99

The clear glass 4 Inch Mini Water Pipe is small and discrete but delivers surprisingly satisfying hits. It makes a perfect portable solution for smokers on the go and works just as well at home in a cozy space. Anyone looking for a well-designed rig with a classic look will find a lot to like in this little package.

The Mini Water Pipe features a clean, functional look and ergonomic design that makes is a hit with veteran and beginners alike. It measures 4” in height and has a flat, sturdy base, bent neck, and 14mm female joint that will fit most standard accessories. Its size and compact design let it discretely fit into a small bag so you can enjoy concentrates wherever you’d like.

If you’re in the market for a functional, scientific-style piece that is compact and discrete, the 4” Mini Water Pipe makes a perfect choice.

 

  • Clear Borosilicate Glass
  • Height: 4 Inches
  • 14mm Female Joint
  • Bent Neck
  • Flat Base

entry.title: Hasty Halo - Vodka - 13.5"
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vodka Glass
Type: Water Pipe
Price: 20.00

This is the Hasty Halo by Vodka, a clear straight tube 13.5" ice bong with a thick, wide base for extra security. It features a coloured accent on the bowl and mouthpiece. The stylized Vodka logo also matches with the accent colour. This piece is extremely easy to clean and maintain. It features a removable slitted inside-cut 18.8 > 14.5mm downstem for added diffusion and easy removable cleaning and ice notches, for optimal filtration with a frosty touch.
The Hasty Halo straight tube comes with a male 14.5mm herb bowl with handle. The handle not only makes it easy to lift the bowl, without the risk of burning your fingers, but it doubles as a roll stopper as well.

Vendor: Dopezilla

No frills! The 10" Slimzilla is your favourite straight tube with an ice catcher, removable diffused downstem and bowl, and features colorful detailing. Available in 4 colors. Includes a 14mm male glass-on-glass bowl.

entry.title: Jay and Bob Mini Water Pipes Snoochies Green
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jay and Silent Bob
Type: HERB - WATER PIPES
Price: 9.90

Jay and Silent Bob are here with mini water pipes to provide you the water filtration you want, but the portability of a pipe. They have everything you love about a larger piece, just miniature! JSB mini water pipes sit 4”/10.16cm tall and are made from handblown borosilicate glass.

The bent neck acts as a splash guard to allow you to take a hit without the fear of splash back, while the choke in the back lets you regulate air flow for the perfect hit. The large bowl can be packed with herb, and is equipped with a handle to make pulling it out easier. The bowl is attached to the downstem for straightforward cleaning. Unlike typical bubblers the pieces can be removed and cleaned separately for the sparkling finish you want.

These pieces feature fun cartoon decals and text you know and love from Kevin Smith’s View Askewniverse. Smoke with Jay, Silent Bob, Mooby,  Bluntman, Chronic and of course the always happy, and scrappy Buddy Christ. There are 7 different styles that come in 4 colors. Each mini water pipe comes with its own custom box for a simple storage solution and a dynamic display option.


B5163G - Snoochies Green
Jay being super metal, while Silent Bob tries to calm him down.
entry.s:tag: Vendor_CHEECH AND CHONG UP IN SMOKE
